content:
Hi @T-libs, we WG-prioritization receive notifications for issues labelled with I-prioritize also for T-libs-* (i.e. issues that need an assessment on how impacting they are). Now that T-libs issues are handled in your own meetings, I was thinking if we could instruct triagebot to not notify us anymore about T-libs-* issues.

Do you already receive prompt notifications from the issue tracker, right?
can we make it give notifications here instead? we don't get notifications now, we just look at the list once a week in the meeting. but would be nice if it shows up in zulip i suppose :)
that's a good alternative! T-compiler currently receive them under #t-compiler/wg-prioritization/alerts - do you want something similar?

Notifications for autolabels are configured here:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/a8b8558f083d86247ef3260ebb4f97b276cdbf73/triagebot.toml#L77
I can check if the same label with a different T-* can send to another stream
